title: Instant Halt v3
description:
Instant Halt v3
---------------

This is a very simple application, with an even more simple purpose:
It will make Windows stop responding.

It works as follows:
Run this application, and within a relative short time, Windows will perform slower and slower and slower.
In the end, Windows will stop responding completely.


Users might lose unsaved data, due to the fact that you cannot make Windows shut down normally.

Other than that, NO DAMAGE IS BEING DONE!!!

After a reboot, your system works perfectly again.


/Ubehage
